  <meta content="http://www.newbelgium.com//images/beerfeature/skinnydip_l.png" property="og:image"/>
  <meta content="&lt;p&gt;Skinny Dip is a full-bodied, figure-friendly tribute to the lightly attired summer months. This guilt-free lager&rsquo;s frisky character and sunny flavor make it the perfect choice for kick-starting seductive summer fun. Lively Cascade hops and complementary peaches brighten a wash of bready malts with sunny citrus flavor and a slight fruity pucker, creating a crisp sip as invigorating as a frothy dip in a mountain pond. Shed your inhibitions this season and take the plunge: Grab a friend, go bottoms up, and share a Skinny Dip.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Skinny Dip makes its returns as the summer seasonal in 2015, and to celebrate we're supporting swimable waters by donating $1, up to $10,000, to&nbsp;&lt;a href=`http://waterkeeper.org/` target=`_blank`&gt;Waterkeeper Alliance&lt;/a&gt;&nbsp;for every use of the hashtag #WaterkeeperDip. Post and donate!&lt;/p&gt;" property="og:description"/>

       <div id="PanelStory">
        <div class="hidden-xs hidden-sm gradient" style="padding: 5px;">
         <span id="ctl00_MainContentFull_ctl01_LabelBrandStory">
          <p>
           Skinny Dip is a full-bodied, figure-friendly tribute to the lightly attired summer months. This guilt-free lagers frisky character and sunny flavor make it the perfect choice for kick-starting seductive summer fun. Lively Cascade hops and complementary peaches brighten a wash of bready malts with sunny citrus flavor and a slight fruity pucker, creating a crisp sip as invigorating as a frothy dip in a mountain pond. Shed your inhibitions this season and take the plunge: Grab a friend, go bottoms up, and share a Skinny Dip.
           <br/>
           <br/>
           Skinny Dip makes its returns as the summer seasonal in 2015, and to celebrate we're supporting swimable waters by donating $1, up to $10,000, to
           <a href="http://waterkeeper.org/" target="_blank">
            Waterkeeper Alliance
           </a>
           for every use of the hashtag #WaterkeeperDip. Post and donate!
          </p>
         </span>
        </div>

             <div>

               Chef John Leonardis of the GourmandGuruGroup
              </span>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="beerDetailFoodPairingItemBody collapse" id="foodbody_3268bb87-36d5-4cd9-bc91-d8759207fc91">
             <div class="" style="float: right;">
              <a href="javascript: void(0);" onclick="printRecipe($('#foodbody_3268bb87-36d5-4cd9-bc91-d8759207fc91'))">

               </i>
              </a>
             </div>
             <div class="beerDetailFoodPairingItemFoodTitle">
              Seared Scallops with Smoked Eggplant
             </div>
             <div>
              <p>
               To me, SKINNY DIP invokes grilled citrus notes as well as a little touch of hazelnut on the back side. The hops are not very aggressive but still let you know they are there. All and all this is a refreshing summer time beer, just perfect for finishing up a long single-track bike ride or a grueling trail run. As far as food pairing, I would cook up seared scallops to set atop roasted and smoked eggplant puree to enhance Skinny Dip's nutty characteristic. To brighten the hop citrus notes ~a little salad of arugula, cilantro, and pickled red onion dressed with grilled lemon and olive oil- these will work together for a refreshing finish.
              </p>
              <p>
              </p>

             </div>
             <div>
              <p>
               Smells like summer.  Citrus rind on the nose with a healthy dose of hops on the palate make this light to medium bodied beer a must for steamed mussels with chorizo.    <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function() {

    $("#lpa").modal();
});

function lpaCheck()
{
    $("#lpa #err").text("Invalid date.");

    var m = parseInt($('#ddlMonth').val(), 10);
    var d = parseInt($('#ddlDay').val(), 10);
    var y = parseInt($('#ddlYear').val(), 10);
    var date = new Date(y, m-1, d);
    if (date.getFullYear() == y &amp;&amp; date.getMonth() + 1 == m &amp;&amp; date.getDate() == d) 
    {
        //valid date
        $("#lpa #err").hide();

        //now, are they 21?
        var currentDate = new Date();
        currentDate.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0);
        var dateOfBirth = new Date(y, m-1, d);
        var calculatedDate = new Date(y + 21, m-1, d);

        var isTwentyOne = calculatedDate &lt;= currentDate;
        //good enough for first pass, send to svc
        if (isTwentyOne) 
        {
            $.ajax({
                url: '/wcf/Social.svc/LPA?y=' + y + '&amp;d=' + d + '&amp;m=' + m + '&amp;reff=',
                type: 'POST',
                dataType: 'json'
            }).done(function(data, textStatus, jqXHR) {
                if (data.Success)
                {
                    $("#lpa").modal('hide');
                }
                else
                {
                    if (data.Message == "ERROR")
                        $("#lpa #err").show();
                    else
                        $("#lpa #err").text("An error occurred checking your birthdate.  Please try again.").show();
                }
            }).fail(function(jqXHR, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                $("#lpa #err").text("An error occurred checking your birthdate.  Please try again.").show();
            });
        }
        else 
        {
            //not 21, go to legal page
            document.location = '/legal.aspx';
            return false;
        }
    } 
    else 
    {
        //invalid date
        $("#lpa #err").show();
        return false;
    }

    return false;
}
   </script>
